name: Derring-Do
overview: Mr. Do coded in Blitz Basic. A clone of Mr. Do!, and a good one. You play as a garden gnome who gets chased by monsters through underground tunnels. To complete a level, either collect all the cherries or defeat all the monsters. After level 10, the game restarts on level 1. There are quite a few different tile sets, bonus items and sound effects thrown in to keep things interesting.
